s: Shotguns and rifles for hunting, sport shooting, home defense, tactical and law enforcement. Mossberg has been a leader in firearms innovation since 1919.
Mossberg has been a leading brand in firearms since 1919. Shop a wide range of reliable shotguns like the best-selling Mossberg 500, along with their selection of handguns and rifles.

Mossberg rifles have a reputation for accuracy, reliability, and innovation, earned on hunting grounds, range lanes, competition benches, and battlefields around the world. Choose a centerfire or rimfire rifle, full-size or youth, and see for yourself.

January 23, 2025 - O. F. Mossberg & Sons (commonly known as Mossberg) is an American firearms manufacturer, specializing in shotguns, rifles, scopes, and pistol accessories.
